title: Personal Settings
description: View and manage your personal information here.

emergency.name: Emergency Kit
emergency.text1: Your Emergency Kit contains the information youâ€™ll need to sign in to your Infisical account.
emergency.text2: Only the latest issued Emergency Kit remains valid. To get a new Emergency Kit, verify your password.

delete-account.name: Danger Zone
delete-account.text1: Are you sure you want to delete your account, it will delete your Organization, memberships, workspaces, secrets and everything that belongs to you forever.
delete-account.text2: You must transfer the ownership of the organization to another member in your organization if you are the Owner of the organization.

api-keys.title: API Keys
api-keys.description: Manage your personal API Keys to access the Infisical API.
